title: Sound On: Iowa Recanvass, NH Primary Preview
itunes:title: Sound On: Iowa Recanvass, NH Primary Preview
description:
Bloomberg Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Panel guests: Max Burns, Democratic Strategist; Contributor at The Daily Beast and The Independent, Chapin Fay, Republican political consultant and former press secretary to former NY Governor George Pataki, and Wendy Benjaminson, Bloomberg Politics Editor.


Kevin also spoke to Briahna Joy Gray, national Press Secretary for the Bernie Sanders Campaign.


To listen on the Bloomberg terminal, click on the player thumbnail on the sidebar.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
